title: 某宝上卖的史蒂夫头盔为什么都是纸箱子啊
author: MC_墨俊

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
然而你想要铁的吗 2333XD





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: qirou
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 爱范希
replies.txt_content:
毕竟是没有授权的，很难去做好，淘宝现在都是劣币驱逐良币。
头套其实可以做好点.. 棉头套夹塑料板  这样舒适度就会很不错，还能把外面的棉套拿下来洗就更好了233

replies.author: 叫我梦想家
replies.txt_content: 自己DIY一个 才好玩呢 = =

replies.txt_content:
你要铁的还是钻石的
你觉得会给你吗
